entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:26 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:26 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
